BALL::ChainPredicate

BALL::ChainPredicate Class Reference

#include <BALL/KERNEL/standardPredicates.h>

Inheritance diagram for BALL::ChainPredicate:

List of all members.


Public Member Functions

virtual bool operator() (const Atom &atom) const

Detailed Description

Predicate for matching chains. Returns true, if the name of the chain that the atom belongs to matches exactly the argument of this expression.

Member Function Documentation

Evaluate the predicate for the atom atom.

Parameters:
atom the atom to test
Returns:
true, if the predicate is true, false otherwise
